page.title: 02POPULATION OF FORD
page.content: The population of {FORD } is about 400-500.There is a majority of middle-aged and older people.Quite a few of these people have been resident for all of their lives.Most of the younger people have moved to { SHREWSBURY },while the older people have stayed there.The main feeling is that more young people should be encouraged to move to the area. The reason for them leaving is that there are no permanent facilities e.g. cinemas,discos and night-clubs.Also there is not much oppurtunity to get a job in{FORD. SHREWSBURY}is situated seven miles away so transport is needed to get there.Since most young people do not have their own transport they go to live in{SHREWSBURY.}So,from this evidence,we see that{FORD}is a village in decline at the moment.
